mapper.select: SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, r.title AS title, u.nickname AS nickname, CASE WHEN sc.level = 3 THEN mc.name WHEN c.level = 2 THEN c.name END AS midCategoryName, CASE WHEN sc.level = 3 THEN sc.name ELSE NULL END AS subCategoryName, r.max_participants AS maxParticipants, r.capacity AS capacity, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM room r JOIN users u ON r.host_user_email = u.email LEFT JOIN category c ON r.cat_id = c.id LEFT JOIN category sc ON c.level = 3 AND sc.id = c.id LEFT JOIN category mc ON sc.parent_id = mc.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC;
